summary: Drop support for old package versions that support PHP 7 and 8.0, keeping only the minimal bounds that meet the PHP >8.1 requirement. This includes removing old versions of internal/promise, nesbot/carbon, and symfony packages.
userImpact: Simplifies dependency tree and reduces maintenance burden for the PHP SDK by removing support for outdated package versions.
rootCause: The project supports PHP >8.1 but maintains compatibility with older versions of dependencies that support PHP 7 and 8.0, creating unnecessary complexity.
proposedFix: Remove the following package version constraints: internal/promise ^2.12, nesbot/carbon ^2.72.6, symfony/filesystem ^5.4.45, symfony/http-client ^5.4.49, and symfony/process ^5.4.47.
keyQuote: Drop support of the packages above that support PHP >7 or >8.0, leave only minimal bounds that meet our requirements >8.1
